name: Present Express Slideshow
summary: A PRESENT file is a slideshow created by the Windows and Android versions of Present Express, a slideshow app. It is a Zip-compressed archive that stores multiple files that make up the slideshow's contents, including an XML file describing the slides and their formatting and other resource files, including embedded images.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PRESENT file open in Present Express 3
images.alt: PRESENT file open in Present Express 3
